Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Deep black and red circular dish, the surfaces of which have been heavily burnished. The burnish left strong horizontal markings on the inside (black) and created a vertical rippled effect (hence "rippled ware") on the outside surface (red with black lip). The lip shows a fine "dents de loup" design ("wolf's teeth" motif).
